member.name: T:LoginRadius.SDK.API.AlbumAPI
member.summary: The Album API is used to get the Album data from the user’s social account. The data will be normalized into LoginRadius' standard data format.

member.name: M:LoginRadius.SDK.API.AlbumAPI.ExecuteAPI(System.Guid)
member.summary: The Album API is used to get the album data from the user’s social account. The data will be normalized into LoginRadius' standard data format.
member.param: A valid session token,which is fetch from Access Token API.

member.name: M:LoginRadius.SDK.API.AlbumAPI.ExecuteRawAPI(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get album data from the user’s social account.The data will not be in a consistent response type and format across providers, so you will have to parse it yourself.
member.param: A valid session token,which is fetch from Access Token API.
